item.title: Longest increasing subsequence
item.description: Problem Source: Vietnamese: Codeforces - Easy Can be solve with $O(n^2)$ solution Codeforces - Hard Need to be solved in $O(n\log n) solution$ English: Leetcode Give an integer array nums. Return the length of the longest increasing subsequence. An increasing subsequence is a subsequence $a_1,..,a_k$ that $$ \begin{align} &i_1 < i_2 < \dots < i_k,\\\ &nums[i_1] < nums[i_2] < \dots < nums[i_k] \end{align} $$ For example:
